open_summary.Rd

Open Payments Summaries

Open Payments Dashboard

Open Payments National Overall Total and Averages

Usage

open_dashboard()

open_national()

Value

A <tibble>

Examples

open_dashboard()
#> Error in stri_replace_first_regex(metric, "^Total Number of ", ""): could not find function "stri_replace_first_regex"
open_national()
